body.name: Chicco Duo 9oz. Hybrid Baby Bottle with Invinci-Glass Inside/Plastic Outside 2-Pack with Slow Flow Anti-Colic Nipple - Clear/Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 21 mins
features: DUO, the first-of-its-kind hybrid baby bottle, provides the purity of glass and convenience of plastic in one unique bottle. A breakthrough medical glass technology permanently bonds a micro-thin inner layer of INVINCI-GLASS to a premium plastic bottle, making it breakproof yet lightweight
Baby’s milk touches pure glass – shields milk from plastic. Won’t shatter, chip, crack, or flake. Laser etched calibrations & decorations - no ink fading or chipping
No nasty smells or aftertaste. Stays clear – won’t stain or discolor. Long-lasting, durable and breakproof. Lightweight and comfortable to hold for both parent and baby

Intui-Latch nipple positions baby’s tongue and lips for a natural, intuitive latch. Skin-like texture helps baby stay latched. Anti-Colic valve vents air away from nipple to increase feeding comfort. Breast like flow makes it ideal for breast to bottle feeding. Bottles come with Stage 1 Slow Flow Nipples (0m+)
Dishwasher, bottle warmer, and electric sterilizer safe. BPA, BPS, PVC & Phthalate-free. Bottles made in the USA
body.description: DUO is an anti-colic bottle that uses a breakthrough medical glass technology that permanently bonds a micro-thin layer of unbreakable INVINCI-GLASS to the inside of a premium plastic bottle – resulting in the FIRST HYBRID BABY BOTTLE. It features the best of both, the lightweight durability of plastic on the outside and the protective properties of glass on the inside. It won’t stain, discolor, retain odor or funky aftertastes. Most importantly, your precious milk touches 100% pure INVINCI-GLASS. It's dishwasher, bottle warmer, and electric sterilizer safe and has minimal parts so you can easily clean your favorite bottle. Award-winning Duo features the exclusive INTUI-LATCH nipple with a 9 out of 10 acceptance rate, breast-like flow, natural feel, and anti-colic valve. Available in single packs, two-packs, and gift sets

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE FIRST OF ITS KIND PURITY OF GLASS & STRENGTH OF PLASTIC ChiccoDUO uses a breakthrough medical technology that permanently bonds a micro-thin layer of unbreakable INVINCI-GLASS to a premium plastic bottle, creating a baby bottle that is break-proof, lightweight and long lasting. It won't stain, discolor, retain odor or funky aftertastes. Most importantly, your precious milk ONLY touches PURE Glass! THE PERFECT BALANCE PURITY OF GLASS The Invinci-Glass inner layer shields milk from plastic. It is breakproof, won’t shatter, chip, or crack and won’t harbor any nasty smells or aftertaste. Duo stays clear and won’t stain. THE PERFECT BALANCE STRENGTH OF PLASTIC The plastic bottle is lightweight and comfortable for baby and parent to hold. This premium plastic is breakproof and free of BPA, BPS, PVC and Phthalates. Baby's milk touches only pure INVINCI-GLASS. ANTI-COLIC FEEDING VENTED INTUI-LATCH NIPPLE Duo’s Intui-Latch nipple is specifically shaped and textured to allow for an intuitive latch and features an air vent and breast-like flow to keep excess air out of baby's tummy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After using every bottle on the market between all 4 of our children, this is my absolute favorite… by far!PROS:- EXTREMELY light weight- EXTREMELY easy to clean- Heats faster than other bottles- Ounce markings are raised plastic and can’t wear off- No weird ridges for milk to get stuck in- And all of the benefits of a glass bottle, but with unbreakable plastic (my toddler has tried)CONS- Some lactation consultants and breastfeeding moms (or babies) might not find the nipple “breast like” enough if you’re nursing and worry about nipple confusion or baby developing a preference for the bottle.- But that’s the only con!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are fantastic. Easy to clean, we love that they are glass on the inside and plastic on the outside. The nipples however do clog, so we got the Pigeon ones also sold here on Amazon. That combination has been wonderful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great light glass option
reviews.reviewText: They are so light! I went from a dr browns to this and it was a game changer. So light and still glass in inside. Super easy to clean and sterilize. I use them with pigeon nipples and it’s perfect. If you want a glass option without the weight these are great. I drop them all the time and my baby has started to throw them and no issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We chose these Chicco Duo bottles for their glass lining. We exclusively formula feed and love these for our baby. She took to them immediately. They are lightweight and easy to use. There are no extra parts to clean. I have dropped them a couple of times, but none have broken. The nipples do occasionally collapse if she sucks too hard, but they open right back up when we take them from her mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love that they're glass
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter has had zero issues with these bottles. She had no troubles adjusting to the nipple shape/flow (she was breast fed and later combo fed). The wider base at the bottom helped her hold it independently without it slipping from her grip. We also have the shorter 6 oz bottles and love those as well.Only complaint is you have to make sure you have a nice wide bottle brush and that you really make sure you scrub the bottom of the bottle well. Because of the shape of the bottle at the base, it can be easy to miss something and then they're not fully clean. Once I noticed this I just purchased a different bottle brush and it solved the problem but definitely something to be aware of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the only bottles my daughter would take for months
reviews.reviewText: I like that these didn't make my daughter colicky and they were lined with glass. these were the only bottles my daughter would take from 1-3 months old. I want to buy the pacifiers next as well I am very fond of the nipple shape of these products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only good for 6 months before crack - poor customer service
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: From 5 stars, to 3 stars, to 1 star. I contacted Chicco regarding the issue with 6 of the 12 bottles i purchased cracking down the measurement line. Their customer service was abysmal and they wanted evidence of every purchase I made, my personal information, and photos of every bottle I included in my complaint. Of course we'd already thrown out a few but I sent them what they requested otherwise to show my concerns were legitimate. Customer service was in no way accommodating or apologetic and I felt like they were more resistant and suspicious than anything. I'll not be risking my child's safety with a company I feel invalidates my concerns as a parent.UPDATE: After about 7 months of use we just noticed that vertically, directly along the measurement line at least half of the bottles have cracked. If you gently squeeze you can see the liquid run out of that line. There was a video uploaded on here by someone else that shows it. I wish the care instructions stated to replace the bottles every six months so I wouldn't have to worry that my baby drank some glass. I edited my review from 5 stars to 3 stars because we have loved these bottles immensely, but the claim that they won't crack or break is untrue and the care instructions should absolutely state they need to be replaced every 6 months if this has happened to multiple people. We did put these in a sterilizer a lot over their lifespan which I'm sure expedited the breakdown, but since every bottle that is compromised is directly down the measurement line, I'd say there is a design flaw and that when they add the measurement line it corrupts the integrity of the product. My baby loves these nipples and is fighting us on the change so I'm not sure if we will repurchase this product or not. I'm apprehensive to say the least.Original:Super great bottles. Love the glass inside, plastic outside combo. Our baby is not colicky but if you hold these with the Chico symbol on the nipple upwards they are supposed to help with that. We bought a bunch. Our baby loves these too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love that they are glass on the inside and plastic on the outside. We tried one in a sample pack from another website and this was the one we liked most from the four options.These work great for my baby who is mostly breastfeeding, but sometimes needs Dad or another adult to give her a bottle.
